short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Google Generative AI from Google Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove Google Search Generative AI is a lightweight, easy-to-use extension designed to remove Google's generative AI responses from your search results. By using this extension, you can streamline your searches and focus on the most relevant and organic results.

Features:
-> Seamless Integration: Automatically removes AI-generated content from Google search results without any extra effort.
-> Enhanced Search Experience: Enjoy a cleaner and more focused search experience by filtering out AI-generated distractions.
-> User-Friendly: Simple to install and easy to use with a clean and intuitive interface.
-> Privacy First: We do not track your search activity or collect any personal data. Your privacy is our priority.
-> Lightweight: Minimal impact on your browser's performance.
How to Use:
-> Install the extension from the Google Web Store.
-> Activate the extension with a single click.
-> Enjoy AI-free search results immediately!

Say goodbye to irrelevant AI-generated content and take control of your search experience with Remove Google Search Generative AI. Download now and enjoy a more efficient and streamlined search journey!
